columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the container.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a container uniquely.

columns.name: account_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the storage account.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: Indicates whether the blob container was deleted.

columns.name: public_access
columns.description: Specifies whether data in the container may be accessed publicly and the level of access.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Specifies the type of the container.

columns.name: default_encryption_scope
columns.description: Default the container to use specified encryption scope for all writes.

columns.name: deleted_time
columns.description: Specifies the time when the container was deleted.

columns.name: deny_encryption_scope_override
columns.description: Indicates whether block override of encryption scope from the container default, or not.

columns.name: has_immutability_policy
columns.description: The hasImmutabilityPolicy public property is set to true by SRP if ImmutabilityPolicy has been created for this container. The hasImmutabilityPolicy public property is set to false by SRP if ImmutabilityPolicy has not been created for this container.

columns.name: has_legal_hold
columns.description: The hasLegalHold public property is set to true by SRP if there are at least one existing tag. The hasLegalHold public property is set to false by SRP if all existing legal hold tags are cleared out. There can be a maximum of 1000 blob containers with hasLegalHold=true for a given account.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: Specifies the date and time the container was last modified.

columns.name: lease_status
columns.description: Specifies the lease status of the container.

columns.name: lease_state
columns.description: Specifies the lease state of the container.

columns.name: lease_duration
columns.description: Specifies whether the lease on a container is of infinite or fixed duration, only when the container is leased. Possible values are: 'Infinite', 'Fixed'.

columns.name: remaining_retention_days
columns.description: Remaining retention days for soft deleted blob container.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The version of the deleted blob container.

columns.name: immutability_policy
columns.description: The ImmutabilityPolicy property of the container.

columns.name: legal_hold
columns.description: The LegalHold property of the container.

columns.name: metadata
columns.description: A name-value pair to associate with the container as metadata.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
